SELECT SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM_ID , SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_HEAD_ID , AND_OR_FLAG , SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM.MS_SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ID , SHOW_ORDER , MS_SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION.LAYER ,
SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM.DELETE_FLAG , SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM.DATA_NO , SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM.USER_KEY , SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM.TS
FROM SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM
INNER JOIN MS_SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION ON MS_SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION.MS_SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ID = SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM.MS_SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ID
WHERE SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM.DELETE_FLAG = 0

UPDATE SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM SET
SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_HEAD_ID = :SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_HEAD_ID ,AND_OR_FLAG = :AND_OR_FLAG ,MS_SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ID = :MS_SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ID ,SHOW_ORDER = :SHOW_ORDER
,DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG ,SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG ,VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID ,DATA_NO = :DATA_NO ,USER_KEY = :USER_KEY ,RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE ,RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID ,TS = :TS
WHERE SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM_ID = :SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM_ID AND TS = :TS

UPDATE SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM SET
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG ,RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE ,RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID
WHERE SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_HEAD_ID = :SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_HEAD_ID
